abilities.description: Allows the user to create and control high heat up to 10,000 degrees, melt objects, burn on contact, and fly via steam jets.
User remains immune to extreme temperatures both hot and cold.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness to water and Seastone

keyMoments.title: Zoro Enters Don Accino's Chamber
keyMoments.description: Don Accino's heat powers are evident in his intensely hot chamber within Lovely Land.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates how Don Accino's Devil Fruit maintains the tropical climate of Lovely Land.

description: A Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to generate and control intense heat. Don Accino uses it to maintain Lovely Land's tropical environment and in combat.

abilities.description: An anime-only variation of Luffy's standard Gomu Gomu no Pistol attack, created specifically for this filler arc.

keyMoments.title: Twin Pistol Debut
keyMoments.description: Luffy uses Twin Pistol attack against Campacino and Brindo.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of this anime-only technique.

description: Luffy's Devil Fruit that gives him rubber properties. In this episode, he uses a new anime-only variation called Twin Pistol.
